name: Antigravity Hunter
description:
Game Made in 3Hs for Trijam #79, Theme: Antigravity.

Instructions:

. Use arrow keys to move and hold down to move the platform up.

-Kill the monsters by stepping on them with the platform bottom.

Sounds from HUMBLE RPG GAME DEVELOPMENT ASSETS BUNDLE: 2D ART, MUSIC AND SOUND EFFECTS.
